headline.main: Miscarriage, Superstition and the Jewish Baby Shower

docs.abstract: After my first pregnancy ended in miscarriage, I spent my second following every superstition in hopes of avoiding a repeat of my misfortune.
docs.snippet: After my first pregnancy ended in miscarriage, I spent my second following every superstition in hopes of avoiding a repeat of my misfortune.

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers say they have found new evidence that Greece's financial crisis is taking a toll on the health of its citizens, including rising rates of HIV, tuberculosis, depression and even infant deaths.

docs.lead_paragraph: When pregnant Nepali teenager Reena Pokharel began labor in her remote village, her family consulted a soothsayer, pressed her stomach and told her to cough to force the baby out.

headline.main: Nepal Must Toughen Fight on Women's 'Fallen Womb' Crisis - Amnesty
headline.print_headline: Nepal Must Toughen Fight on Women's 'Fallen Womb' Crisis - Amnesty

docs.lead_paragraph: Nancy Gonzalez, the former correction officer who was impregnated by an inmate who was twice sentenced to the federal death penalty, was sentenced to a year and a day in prison.

headline.main: Year in Prison for Ex-Guard Who Had Child With Inmate
headline.print_headline: Year in Prison for Ex-Guard Who Had Child With Inmate

docs.abstract: Nancy Gonzalez, former correction officer who was impregnated by inmate who was twice sentenced to federal death penalty, is sentenced to year and a day in prison for her role in illicit relationship; sentencing marks conclusion of case that was odd sideshow to high-profile trials of inmate Ronell Wilson, convicted of execution-style murders of two undercover police detectives in Staten Island in 2003.
docs.snippet: Nancy Gonzalez, the former correction officer who was impregnated by an inmate who was twice sentenced to the federal death penalty, was sentenced to a year and a day in prison.

docs.lead_paragraph: Surrogate baby-making, though restricted in many states, has been growing among gay men.

headline.seo: In New York, a Push for Compensated Surrogacy

docs.abstract: Surrogate baby-making, though restricted in many states, is growing among gay men; practice has long been path taken by the affluent and celebrities, partly because it takes good legal advice and money to accomplish, but in recent years has become popular option for gay men who see having children as logical next step after getting married.
docs.snippet: Surrogate baby-making, though restricted in many states, has been growing among gay men.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Colorado woman was indicted Wednesday on federal charges alleging that she kidnapped her half sister's newborn from Wisconsin and left him behind an Iowa gas station in freezing weather.

headline.main: Woman Indicted in Wisconsin Newborn's Kidnapping
headline.print_headline: Woman Indicted in Wisconsin Newborn's Kidnapping

docs.snippet: A Colorado woman was indicted Wednesday on federal charges alleging that she kidnapped her half sister's newborn from Wisconsin and left him behind an Iowa gas station in freezing weather.

docs.lead_paragraph: A former jail guard who had a behind-bars affair with a New York City man convicted in the brutal slaying of two police officers was sentenced Wednesday to one year and one day in prison.

headline.main: NY Guard Gets Prison for Sex With Officers' Killer
headline.print_headline: NY Guard Gets Prison for Sex With Officers' Killer

docs.snippet: A former jail guard who had a behind-bars affair with a New York City man convicted in the brutal slaying of two police officers was sentenced Wednesday to one year and one day in prison.
